title: Outliers
text: Recall that any DATA that are less than Q1 - 1.5(IQR) or more than Q3 + 1.5(IQR) are potential outliers. IQR means interquartile range.

title: Outliers below the acceptable range
text: What is the lower acceptable range? (answer for Q1 - 1.5(IQR)) Please round to 2ed decimal places

title: Outliers above the acceptable range
text: What is the higher acceptable range? (answer for Q3 + 1.5(IQR)) Please round to 2ed decimal places
